content:
I'll create a report based on the provided logs:

# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining and Smelting Complex at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-27.0,-58.0)
- Multiple burner inserters at positions (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5)
- Output chest at position (-24.5,-58.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Factory at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at positions (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at positions (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network providing power distribution

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction Errors
- When attempting to extract items, ensure the source container actually contains the requested items
- Verify the extraction target exists and is accessible

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure consistent fuel supply to all machines
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - verify the supply chain is properly connected and supplied
- Some chests are reaching full capacity - implement a better item management system or increase storage capacity

### Fluid System Issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections and fluid flow
- Verify boiler has consistent fuel supply to maintain steam production
